trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around March 3rd 2008
Summary: Noticed 3 discs, one larger than the other two going against the moving clouds.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas traveling out of Sacramento on hwy80. Stopped. It was about 4:30 pm. Took a look at the clouds being blown around by the wind. Son was with me and he was the one that noticed the three dics going in the opposite direction of the clouds. He pointed them out to me. I also saw them. One was larger than the other two. Wondered if anyone else had seen them also? Nohotos were taken.
